comment: Lemma for ~ elqaa . The function ` N ` represents the denominators of the rational coefficients ` B ` . By multiplying them all together to make ` R ` , we get a number big enough to clear all the denominators and make ` R x. F ` an integer polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.) (Revised by AV, 3-Oct-2020.)
